comment: Say NO to diversity. Don't let America become a third world shithole.
amr:
# ::snt Say NO to diversity. Don't let America become a third world shithole.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (n / no
                  :topic (d / diversity)))
      :snt2 (l / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (b / become-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "America"))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / shithole
                        :mod (w / world
                              :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                    :value 3))))))

comment: Can we please avoid using hateful language like that here? Keep those opinions and thoughts to yourself.

      :snt2 (k / keep-01

comment: That is a hateful thing to say. And a little too late. I think half of our country is already diverse and getting more beautiful!

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (h / hate-01)
            :ARG1-of (s / say-01)
            :domain (t2 / that))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op2 (l / late
                  :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG3 (t3 / too
                              :mod (l2 / little)))
                  :ARG1-of h2))
      :snt3 (t4 / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / diverse
                        :domain (c / country
                              :ARG1-of (ii2 / include-91
                                    :ARG2 (c2 / country
                                          :poss (w / we))
                                    :ARG3 (h3 / half)))
                        :time (a3 / already))
                  :op2 (g / get-03
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG2 (b / beautiful-02
                              :ARG1 c
                              :ARG2-of h2
                              :ARG1 c
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more))))))

comment: The "n word" is hateful, racist, demeaning and offensive and so does not belong in intelligent commentary. Please desist--thanks!
amr:
# ::snt The "n word" is hateful, racist, demeaning and offensive and so does not belong in intelligent commentary. Please desist--thanks!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hate-01
                  :ARG0 (w / word
                        :mod (s / string-entity
                              :value "n")))
            :op2 (r / racist
                  :domain w)
            :op3 (d / demean-01
                  :ARG0 w)
            :op4 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 w)
            :op5 (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (b / belong-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (c2 / comment-01
                              :ARG1-of (ii / intelligent-01)))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (d2 / desist-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you))
            :op2 (t / thank-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y)))
